summary: Activity method with nullable string parameter fails to deserialize null values during hydration. The data converter rejects null for a nullable parameter, throwing a type conversion exception.
userImpact: Users cannot pass null values to activity methods with nullable parameters, even though the method signature allows it.
rootCause: The JsonConverter rejects null values during deserialization when the parameter type is string, even though the parameter is marked as nullable (?string).
resolutionDetails: The SDK was updated to properly handle null values for nullable parameters during data conversion.
keyQuote: The passed value of type "null" can not be converted to required type "string"
